entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, standing on an outcrop of rock.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard who is with Harry.

entities.name: cliff
entities.description: A towering cliff behind Harry and Dumbledore.

entities.name: rock
entities.description: Large chunks of rock that have broken away from the cliff face.

entities.name: sea
entities.description: The moonlit sea below Harry and Dumbledore.

entities.name: village
entities.description: A village where the kids from the orphanage are brought.

entities.name: orphanage
entities.description: An institution that cares for children without parents.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are standing together on the outcrop of rock.
The cliff is behind Harry and Dumbledore.
Dumbledore mentions a village where the kids from the orphanage are brought.
Harry is connected to the orphanage through his relationship with Dumbledore.
